title: Charlie the Caterpillar
description: Charlie the Caterpillar Â by Andy GutmanWhen Charlie the Caterpillar looks in the mirror, all he sees is what's missing. But with the help of some caring and colorful friends, he begins to learn it's what inside that counts.The book's lively illustrations in vibrant colors bring the story to life. Its lyrical words work for both reading silently and aloud.The accompanying contemporary "Charlie the Caterpillar" song, also written by Gutman, is available on iTunes, Spotify and SoundCloud and is sure to have children and their parents tapping their toes, too ( soundcloud.com/drewgut )!
author: Andy Gutman
